resources.string: After this many failed login attempts reset the device to factory settings
A UI to do some device administration tasks that are not exposed otherwise.

This app must be added to the device administrators list in order to function. It needs permission to monitor screen-unlock attempts in order to keep track of failed unlock attempts and reset the counter on success, and it needs the ability to erase all data so it can erase your phone after too many attempts. Consider carefully if that is acceptable to you before accepting!
